entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS AROUND 60

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70
